game.name: Pretty Bride
game.description:
Every bride wants to look pretty on her big day. In Pretty Bride, the special day has just come, and your favorite girl Emily is pretty excited to get ready for her wedding. Her love is waiting for her and she has approached you to pick up an awesome wedding outfit. Do you help this cute bride? Join this brand new dressing game for girls and be prepared to guide her to get a perfect wedding look! There would be no shortage for the elegant gowns and matching accessories. 
Make sure to do your best as she wants to be ready to marry the man of her life. She has chosen as her fashion stylist as the girl is surrounded by a lot of confusion. Now it is up to you to help her decide which outfit will be a suitable choice for a wonderful wedding ceremony. Remember she is a bride, so the eyes of all the guests of the ceremony will be on her. Do not take a single chance and mix and match all dress and accessory options to make her look a brightening bride. 
Start this html5 mobile dress up game by clicking the play button and you would see different product categories on the right side of the screen! Choose from different types of necklaces, dresses, tiaras, earrings and hairstyles. You can see the girl on the left side of the screen. Once you are done, click the next button given at the bottom right corner of the screen. All the best to surprise all the guests with her amazing bride looks! Check out more free girls games on atmegame.com, and have fun, no download required!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Pretty Bride at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Dressing games for best excitement and thrill in you!
